Great leaders lead their empires to prosperity... And what have you done? Brought the wrath of Gods upon yourself and lost your mind!
You desdendants will restore these ravaged lands. Rest in peace.
(The Baium Raid is only available to the members of a clan that has conquered Aden Castle or Rune Castle on their server. Entrance time: Wednesday, 10 p.m. - 11 p.m.)
